Title: #HearTogether: Freiburg Baroque & Kristian Bezuidenhout perform Beethoven's Piano Concertos 1-3
Description:
No matter where you are watching or listening from, we are #HearTogether. Music entertains, uplifts and inspires us. We need it now more than ever. So while our doors may be closed, the music continues online.

ABOUT THE CONCERT

Performed live in March this year, shortly before the Centre had to close the its doors due to coronavirus, our Signature Event saw standing ovations for the players of Freiburg Baroque, Bezuidenhout and their masterful interpretations of Beethoven. Now you can relieve this performance online or enjoy it for the very first time.

View the program notes for this concert here: https://mrc-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/assets/File/10286.pdf

PROGRAM

Ludwig van Beethoven
Piano Concerto No.1 in C, Op.15
First movement 0:39
Second movement 15:34 
Third movement 24:44

Piano Concerto No.2 in B flat, Op.19
First movement 37:17
Second movement 50:55
Third movement 58:37

Piano Concerto No.3 in C minor, Op.37
First movement 1:08:41
Second movement 1:25:04
Third movement 1:33:50

Title: Beethoven Piano Concerto No. 2 / Kammerorchester Basel / Bezuidenhout / Antonini
Description:
Ludwig van Beethoven (1770-1827): Piano Concerto No. 2 in B-flat major, Op. 19

0:00 Vorspann
0:14 I. Allegro con brio
13:12 II. Adagio
20:42 III. Rondo. Molto Allegro

Kristian Bezuidenhout, piano
Giovanni Antonini, conductor

Gstaad, Menuhin Festival, 02.09.2016

Producer: Thomas Märki
Regie: Johannes Bachmann
Sound: Daniel Comploi
Editing: Amaury Berger
Technical support: Lasse Nipkow / Silent Work GmbH
Camera: Caroline Reucker, Julian Gresenz, Muriel Kunz, Dennis Staufer, Luca Egger

HMF Productions

Title: Beethoven Triplekonzert – I. Faust, S. Gabetta, K. Bezuidenhout, G. Antonini, Kammerorchester Basel
Description:
Ludwig van Beethoven (1770 – 1827): 
Konzert für Klavier, Violine, Violoncello und Orchester C-Dur op. 56 «Tripelkonzert»
0:00 (Auftritt)
0:47 I. Allegro
17:50 II. Largo
21:44 III. Rondo alla Polacca

Sinfonie Nr. 5 c-Moll op. 67
44:05 I. Allegro con brio
50:54 II. Andante con moto
59:04 III. Allegro
1:03:42 IV. Allegro

1:17:00 Ouvertüre zu «Die Geschöpfe des Prometheus» C-Dur op.43

Isabelle Faust (Violine), Sol Gabetta (Violoncello), Kristian Bezuidenhout (Klavier), Giovanni Antonini (Leitung), Kammerorchester Basel

Abokonzert Kammerorchester Basel «Ziemlich beste Freunde», 27.5.2022 – Stadtcasino Basel

Title: Beethoven: Klavierkonzert Nr. 3⎮Kristian Bezuidenhout⎮François-Xavier Roth, Gürzenich Orchester Köln
Description:
Kristian Bezuidenhout und das Gürzenich-Orchester Köln widmen sich Ludwig van Beethovens drittem Klavierkonzert. Dirigat: François-Xavier Roth.


Das digitale Programmheft zum Konzert: https://www.guerzenich-orchester.de/media/filer_public/9b/03/9b0317ee-4fb3-4696-b7f6-68172c14e00f/go_abend_abo3_web.pdf

Recorded on 10 November 2020.

Title: W.A. Mozart: Piano Concerto No  17 in G major, KV  453
Description: The supremely inspired Petra Müllejans leads the Freiburger Barockorchester (an orchestra of extraordinary scholars) through a rendition of Mozart's Piano Concerto No  17 in G major, featuring Kristian Bezuidenhout, the world's foremost fortepianist.

Title: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart   Symphony No  25 Freiburg Baroque Orchestra with Kristian Bezuidenhout, 3 F
Description:
